management.title: Inventory Management

expirations.title: Expirations Tracking
expirations.desc: Receive alerts when products are nearing expiration to minimize waste.

lowStock.title: Low Stock Alerts
lowStock.desc: Stay on top of stock levels with automatic alerts.

productTracking.title: Product Tracking
productTracking.desc: Track each product's movement within your inventory for visibility.

zeroDelay.heading: Zero Delay
zeroDelay.description: Experience instant updates on stock levels, orders, and item movements — no waiting or manual refresh needed.

noHiddenFee.heading: No Hidden Fee
noHiddenFee.description: Enjoy full transparency with our pricing — no setup costs or hidden charges, just simple and affordable inventory management.

alerts.heading: Alerts & Notifications
alerts.description: Stay informed with real-time alerts for low stock, new orders, or inventory changes, ensuring you never miss a critical update.

reviews.title: Hear what they say about us

1.name: Alix Beckstrand
1.text: Amazing App. Gives a great visual on current and future inventory. We decreased stockout from 4% to 1% in 2 months with Prediko. That’s hundreds of thousands of extra revenue per year unlocked! Team are super supportive to any requests too! Would highly recommend!

2.name: John Smith
2.text: Prediko changed the way we manage inventory. The predictive e-commerce solutions saved us a lot of wasted stock and boosted our efficiency. Absolutely recommend!

3.name: Sarah Johnson
3.role: Supply Chain Manager at ABC Corp
3.text: The insights we got from Prediko are unmatched. Stockouts are rare now and we’ve saved huge amounts by optimizing stock levels.

4.name: Michael Lee
4.text: Simple, intuitive, and powerful. The alerts saved us so many times from overselling. A must-have for any business.

5.name: Anna Kim
5.text: Game-changer for inventory. Forecasting accuracy is spot-on and the support team is great!

aboutHero.subtitle: Track stock in real time, prevent shortages, and make smarter restocking decisions with ease. Our system gives you full visibility into your business inventory — anytime, anywhere.

roots.subtitle: We’re building the future of inventory control — smarter, faster, and more connected for businesses of all sizes.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify how businesses track, manage, and optimize their inventory by providing intuitive, automated, and data-driven solutions that save time and eliminate waste.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the go-to inventory management platform that helps businesses stay in control, make informed decisions, and grow confidently in a data-driven world.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about using our inventory management system.

items.title: How does the system work?
items.description: Our inventory management system helps you track products, stock levels, and sales in real-time. Once items are added, the system automatically updates quantities as sales or purchases occur, giving you accurate and up-to-date insights.

items.title: How do I create an account?
items.description: Click on the “Sign Up” button, fill in your business details, and verify your email address. Once verified, you can start adding products, managing stock, and accessing your e-commerce solutions dashboard.

items.title: Is my data secure?
items.description: Absolutely. We use bank-grade encryption, secure cloud storage, and regular backups to ensure your business data is safe and private at all times.

items.title: Can I access the platform on mobile?
items.description: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works smoothly on smartphones and tablets, allowing you to manage your inventory from anywhere.

items.title: Do you offer customer support?
items.description: Yes, our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email to help you resolve issues or guide you through any feature of the system.

pricingHero.paragraph: Our pricing is designed to keep things simple, transparent, and fair. You only pay for what you use — no hidden charges or complicated plans. Whether you’re a small business or a large enterprise, our flexible structure ensures you get the tools you need to manage, track, and grow your inventory efficiently.

list.title: Point of Sale
content: Speed up order processing in your restaurant with customizable sales screen and item modifiers
Easily apply discounts and run effective promotions
Create, save, and edit orders, letting customers pay when it’s convenient
Offer full or partial refunds for customer convenience
Keep track of cash movements, including sales, refunds, pay-ins/outs, and the expected cash amount in a drawer

list.title: Inventory Management
content: Track stock levels in real time
Monitor sales by various payment types with breakdowns of cash, card, and other payment methods

list.title: Customer Loyalty
content: Reward your loyal customers with points
Offer targeted discounts based on purchase history
Connect a receipt printer, kitchen printer, and cash drawer for enhanced operations
Send orders to the kitchen display to reduce errors, speed up service, and keep operations organized with a paperless system
Connect the Loyverse Customer Display app to show order details to your customers for greater transparency and convenience

section1.paragraph: Simplify your daily operations with real-time stock tracking, automated restocking alerts, and advanced e-commerce solutions. Our platform helps you gain full visibility and control over your business performance — anytime, anywhere.
